author: manoni
body:
Implementation of several plots in SiStripMonitorCluster package: number of cluster trend in wheel/layer, number of cluster per ring and per layer. Change in apv charge median plot switch in SiStripMonitorDigi package (PR already submitted for CMSSW_8_1_X).

I didn't modified nor committed (not even checked-out in my working release) PhysicsTools/MVATrainer/plugins/ProcTMVA.cc which appear as modified file.
title: Cmssw 9 0 root6 x 2017 01 16 2300 clus trend9
